subject: Fwd: A heartfelt message from me to you
description_text:
---------- Thư đã chuyển tiếp ---------
Từ: Long Nguyen <longnguyenjp.mei@gmail.com>
Ngày: Th 4, 24 thg 12, 2025 lúc 16:53
Tiêu đề: A heartfelt message from me to you
Đến: <service@simsonn.com>, <support@simsonn.com>


Dear Simsonn Team,

I normally wouldn't write an email like this, but I feel I have no other
choice but to speak honestly from my heart.

Over the past weeks, I've been quietly waiting and trying to be patient.
When I realized my main email address (longnguyenhm.ktv@gmail.com) might
have been blocked, it truly hurt me. Not because of the money alone, but
because it makes me feel ignored and powerless.

I know this commission amount is very small compared to your company’s
scale. For you, it may be almost nothing. But for me, it is different. I am
not a large agency or a big partner — I am just one individual trying to
make a living through my work.

I put genuine effort into promoting your brand, believing in a fair and
respectful partnership. This commission means paying my basic expenses and
supporting my family. Waiting without clarity has caused me a lot of stress
and sleepless nights, especially as the year comes to an end.

I am not asking for charity. I am only asking for what I have already
earned through honest work. I truly hope you can understand how important
this payment is to me, even if it seems insignificant from your side.

If there has been any misunderstanding or mistake on my part, I sincerely
apologize. I just hope you can see me not as a number, but as a real person
who has tried his best.

Thank you for reading this message. I still believe in goodwill and hope
for your kindness and support.

Sincerely,
David Long
